price: Mi smo je objavili u Blagoslovljenoj noći i Mi, doista, upozoravamo;
arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةٖ مُّبَٰرَكَةٍۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innā anzalnāhu fī laylatin mubārakatin innā kunnā mundhirīna
